about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a passionate and results-oriented software engineer with experience in fintech, AI-driven applications, and full-stack development. I have delivered production-ready systems at scale, ranging from secure payment gateways and voucher platforms to AI-powered learning and travel planning applications. Skilled across multiple stacks and cloud platforms, I thrive in building innovative, reliable, and globally scalable solutions.

experience.description: Developed an AI learning platform (Node.js, Flutter, OpenAI APIs), a travel planner app with itinerary generation and booking integration, and an e-commerce platform for vouchers/gift cards with secure payment gateways and real-time management.

Built Visa Installment Services library for Indian merchants, a voucher-based payment system for gaming clients across regions, and HyperSwitch Pro_User flow with automated reconciliation. Tech stack included Python, Rust, Purescript, PostgreSQL, AWS, Jenkins, and Grafana.
Enhanced chatbot with multilingual support and Facebook Messenger integration via Rasa. Improved job search reach for global users.
Developed trading application Mintro-Trade with forex API integrations and backend job workflows. Used Flutter, React, Node.js, Python, and GCP.

projects.name: AI Learning Platform
projects.description: An education app that integrates AI tutors to guide students in real time.

projects.name: Travel Planner App
projects.description: App with itinerary generation, booking integrations, and map-based discovery.

projects.name: Voucher/Gift Card Platform
projects.description: E-commerce platform with secure payments and real-time card management.

projects.name: Smart India Hackathon Project
projects.description: Image recognition app to monitor Mid-Day Meal program compliance.

projects.name: GPS Bus Tracker
projects.description: Real-time college bus tracking for students and parents.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science

testimonials.name: John Smith
testimonials.quote: Anji is an exceptional developer who consistently delivers high-quality solutions. His expertise in full-stack development and AI integration made our project a huge success.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.quote: Working with Anji was a pleasure. His technical skills in Rust and Python, combined with his problem-solving abilities, helped us build robust payment systems that scaled globally.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.quote: Anji's work on our AI learning platform exceeded expectations. His ability to integrate OpenAI APIs with Flutter created an intuitive and powerful educational tool.
